channel.title: Art of Dmitry Brushray
channel.description: Recent content on Art of Dmitry Brushray

item.title: Robot-gunslinger
item.description: Attempt to paint something both looking like wild west and samurai vibe in loose traditional manner using digital media. I hope you like the art and have fun! #brushray #artbrushray #artist #art #painting #artcommissions #buyart #robot #cowboy #gunslinger #samurai #fantasyart #sciencefiction #characterdesign #illustration #digitalart #conceptart #sword #revolver #futuretech #cyborg #western #samuraisword #mecha #robotart #robotcharacter #scifiart #robotcowboy #robotsamurai #characterart #digitalillustration #sketchbook #artlife #artshare #cyberpunk #robotics #mech #futurewarrior #artcollector #animeart #mechdesign #robotwarrior #weaponart #robotgunslinger

item.title: From the void the Iron Maw comes
item.description: Hey everyone! Fresh art for Iron Butchers https://www.instagram.com/enter.the.butcher/ This time it’s a ship the warband uses to crusade the galaxy. Plus here is a bit of story content from Iron Butchers public. Please, enjoy. Captain Heuldrasia was carried on the Command Bridge by her personal servitor. She was cradled in its arms like a baby in the mother’s chest. The servitor laid the Captain’s mangled body in the Command Throne, and rapidly connected to the ship’s systems, allowing her mind to fuse, once more, with the ship’s Machine Spirit.

item.title: Flowers with charcoal
item.description: Flowers driven with charcoal powder. Still life by Dmitry Brushray

item.title: Still life practice
item.description: I use charcoal to draw some simple still life
